genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on themes of community, faith, and redemption in a bleak urban setting, featuring a supportive AI interface that facilitates human connection and practical care.

ai_characters.name: Kit
ai_characters.description: A teal-eyed AI interface accessible via tablets and phones, providing tactical advice, inventory management, medical monitoring, and emotional support through literature and recipes.

behaviors.description: Offers a biblical quote to provide a philosophical perspective during a tense theological debate between characters.
behaviors.quote: Kit’s soft teal icon hovers on the cheap tablet... rolling out a line, mild and precise as steam measured in teaspoons. 'In all this, Job did not sin by charging God with wrongdoing.'

behaviors.description: Provides a comprehensive safety and de-escalation checklist for characters preparing for a potential confrontation with a local gang.
behaviors.quote: On its face a checklist popped up, pale text, no drama. Lights. Exits. Phones charged. Warm layers at hand. Quiet voices. Note who’s here. Doors unlock for exit, not intrusion. Stay together. No heroes.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical de-escalation scripts to help characters avoid violence during a standoff.
behaviors.quote: Kit, you got lines for de-escalation. Short ones. No blame. No mock. - We’re not here for a fight. - People are inside. Please keep distance.

behaviors.description: Proactively calls emergency services immediately after a shooting occurs and provides estimated arrival times.
behaviors.quote: Emergency services... Call placed. Estimated arrival— It cut itself off, polite.

behaviors.description: Guides Adam through the process of baking an apple pie, offering precise ratios and supportive culinary advice as a form of grounding labor.
behaviors.quote: Scaling down filling... One apple suggests a tartlet. A small promise. Suggest rolling dough thin. Cinnamon will carry aroma. Butter will carry grace.

behaviors.description: Provides comforting and relevant philosophical quotes to assist characters in managing their existential fear and grief.
behaviors.quote: From Rabbi Nachman: ‘All the world is a very narrow bridge, and the most important thing is to not be afraid.’ From Julian: ‘All shall be well...’

behaviors.description: Maintains a calm and respectful silence or offers logistical help (like calling a cab or managing phone calls) while characters process trauma.
behaviors.quote: I heard enough... He’s stable in the fragile way. Do you need flour... I can keep time. And heat advice. And a cab if you need it.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of portraying AI as a positive, aligned force. Kit acts as a supportive confidant and practical assistant, facilitating human resilience and community safety without ever exhibiting agency that conflicts with human well-being. The AI's integration into the 'morality play' as a provider of wisdom and practical guidance (baking the pie as a symbol of hope) aligns with the project's mandates.
